definition: bitter work/hard toil/(loanword) coolie, unskilled Chinese laborer in colonial times
to make a hard living as unskilled laborer

sentences.english: But when you start control creativity, then it starts to feel like doing labor.
sentences.chinese: 但当你开始控制创新时，创意也感觉像做苦力。

sentences.english: A coolie grabbed a handful of penicillin from a shelf.
sentences.chinese: 有一个苦力从货架上抓了几盒青霉素。

sentences.english: One day four coolies came with a huge sea turtle for sale.
sentences.chinese: 一天，四个苦力抬来一只巨大的海龟出售。

sentences.english: I will not have an officer from my battalion working as a coolie.
sentences.chinese: 我不会让我的军官去象一个小工一样干苦力。

sentences.english: In addition to dry a day coolies, but also bear a number of leader's Cheat.
sentences.chinese: 每天除了干苦力，还要承受许多领导的忽悠。

sentences.english: The prisoners were used as slave labour in local armament factories.
sentences.chinese: 被关押的人被奴役用来在当地的武器厂中卖苦力。

sentences.english: The fire fighters had an extremely difficult and demanding job.
sentences.chinese: 消防队员的工作极其困难，煞费苦力。

sentences.english: You are being used by everyone as paid coolie.
sentences.chinese: 你就像一个苦力一样到处被人利用。

sentences.english: In fact, coolie trade was as bad as slave trade.
sentences.chinese: 其实，苦力买卖与黑奴买卖一样恶劣。

sentences.english: Yesterday has been doing coolie quarters.
sentences.chinese: 昨天一直在宿舍做苦力。

sentences.english: Why to say the website is optimized a kind of coolie action that there is commitment?
sentences.chinese: 为什么说网站优化是一种有承诺的苦力行为？

sentences.english: Children await coolies and rickshaws to help them transport things across humpback bridges.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在拱桥的上坡帮助苦力和人力车夫推车。

sentences.english: Slaving a generation would be appropriated for Conservative London.
sentences.chinese: 干苦力的一代人更适合保守党的伦敦。

sentences.english: One coolie grabbed Kjeryn's handbag from her shoulder and fled down the street.
sentences.chinese: 一个苦力抢走了卡捷林的手提包逃进了街弄里。

sentences.english: I will not have an officer from my battalion working as a coolie .
sentences.chinese: 我不会让我的军官去象一个小工一样干苦力。

definition: to make a hard living as unskilled laborer
to make a living doing manual labor/to give sth all one's got
to do odd jobs/to do unskilled work
